name: salesforce-itcss-stylesheet
description: A simple ITCSS folder structure for Salesforce Visualforce projects.

scripts.build: npm run stylelint && node-sass --include-path scss theme/scss/app.scss theme/styles.css --output-style compressed
scripts.theme-deploy: npm install && npm run build && sfdx force:source:deploy -m StaticResource:theme
